instructions.title: Instructions

items: 1. This is an IQ test engine.
2. Just like normal IQ tests a 3x3 grid will be shown with the last item missing.
3. Your task is to find the grid pattern and find out what shape the missing item has.

header: Below is an example grid. Clearly the pattern is just repeating what's on the line.
You can form the missing item by clicking the buttons below the grid. Try to solve it!
footer: Try clicking each button more than once!
You'll only have this one time to train. Click on advance only when you're ready!

3: 2. You will have 1 minute to solve each question.
3. Make sure your answer is correct. Once you have advanced a question, it is not possible to return.
4. After clicking the 'Start' button, a timer will start and there is no going back.
